video_title: AI Agents: From Tools to Infrastructure
source: Sid Dani's AI Agents Presentation PDF

scenes.name: Opening - The Evolution Journey
scenes.content: People → Tools → AI agents → ...next? progression diagram

scenes.name: Tool Evolution - Stone to Digital
scenes.content: Stone Era → Industrial Era → Digital Era silhouettes

scenes.name: Digital Apps as Toolboxes
scenes.content: Gmail, Calendar, Audience Manager app cards with MCP tools

scenes.name: Agent Architecture
scenes.content: Model + Tool loop + Environment + Context + Evals diagram

scenes.name: Infrastructure Race Finale
scenes.content: Data centers, gigawatts: constraint is watts not intelligence

visual_style.consistency: Global dark background, clean typography, minimal icons throughout
visual_style.transitions: Fade in-out (1.5s each) with seamless merging

pipeline_used: JSON Prompt Generator Module → Nanobanana Images → Sora2 Fade → Sora2 Merge
notes: First complete test of JSON→Images→Video pipeline with 6-scene sequence. Proves flexibility (6 scenes) and quality (Emily standards). Presentation style from Sid Dani's PDF maintained throughout.
